00011 /** @file */
00012 
00013 #ifndef __ROTBUFFER_H__
00014 #define __ROTBUFFER_H__
00015 
00016 struct rotbuffer {
00017         char *buff_end;
00018         char *buff_start;
00019         int buff_len;
00020         int buff_size;
00021         char buff[1];
00022 };
00023 
00024 /** 
00025  * read max data from fd 
00026  * @param r struct rotbuffer
00027  * @param fd file descriptor
00028  */
00029 int rotbuffer_read_fd(struct rotbuffer *r, int fd);
00030 
00031 /** 
00032  * write max data to fd
00033  * @param r struct rotbuffer
00034  * @param fd file descriptor
00035  */
00036 int rotbuffer_write_fd(struct rotbuffer *r, int fd);
00037 
00038 /** 
00039  * add byte at end of stream. don't check for avalaible space
00040  * @param r struct rotbuffer
00041  * @param c char
00042  * @return 0 no space left, 1 if ok
00043  */
00044 static inline void rotbuffer_add_byte_wc(struct rotbuffer *r, char c) {
00045         *r->buff_end = c;
00046         r->buff_end++;
00047         r->buff_len++;
00048         if (r->buff_end >= r->buff + r->buff_size)
00049                 r->buff_end = r->buff;
00050 }
00051 
00052 /** 
00053  * add byte at end of stream
00054  * @param r struct rotbuffer
00055  * @param c char
00056  * @return 0 no space left, 1 if ok
00057  */
00058 static inline int rotbuffer_add_byte(struct rotbuffer *r, char c) {
00059         if (r->buff_len + 1 > r->buff_size)
00060                 return 0;
00061         rotbuffer_add_byte_wc(r, c);
00062         return 1;
00063 }
00064 
00065 /** 
00066  * add byte at position defined in stream.
00067  * warning: function without integrity control.
00068  * @param r struct rotbuffer
00069  * @param pos position to add
00070  * @param c char
00071  * @return next postion
00072  */
00073 static inline char *rotbuffer_add_byte_at_pos(struct rotbuffer *r,
00074                                               char *pos, char c) {
00075         *pos = c;
00076         pos++;
00077         if (pos >= r->buff + r->buff_size)
00078                 pos = r->buff;
00079         return pos;
00080 }
00081 
00082 /**
00083  * return free space on rot buffer
00084  * @param r struct rotbuffer
00085  * @return space avalaible
00086  */
00087 static inline int rotbuffer_free_size(struct rotbuffer *r) {
00088         return r->buff_size - r->buff_len;
00089 }
00090 
00091 /**
00092  * get current position in buffer
00093  * @param r struct rotbuffer
00094  * @return current position
00095  */
00096 static inline char *rotbuffer_store(struct rotbuffer *r) {
00097         return r->buff_end;
00098 }
00099 
00100 /**
00101  * seek space into buffer without space check.
00102  * @param r struct rotbuffer
00103  * @param seek seek value
00104  */
00105 static inline void rotbuffer_seek_wc(struct rotbuffer *r, int seek) {
00106         r->buff_len += seek;
00107         r->buff_end += seek;
00108         if (seek >= 0) {
00109                 if (r->buff_end >= r->buff + r->buff_size)
00110                         r->buff_end -= r->buff_size;
00111         } else {
00112                 if (r->buff_end < r->buff)
00113                         r->buff_end += r->buff_size;
00114         }
00115 }
00116 
00117 /**
00118  * seek space into buffer with space check.
00119  * @param r struct rotbuffer
00120  * @param seek seek value
00121  * @return 0: no space avalaible, 1 ok
00122  */
00123 static inline int rotbuffer_seek(struct rotbuffer *r, int seek) {
00124         if (r->buff_len + seek > r->buff_size)
00125                 return 0;
00126         rotbuffer_seek_wc(r, seek);
00127         return 1;
00128 }
00129 
00130 /**
00131  * return the len from pos1 to pos2
00132  * @param r struct rotbuffer
00133  * @param p1 position 1 (returned by rotbuffer_store)
00134  * @param p2 position 2 (returned by rotbuffer_store)
00135  * @return the space used
00136  * @see rotbuffer_store
00137  */
00138 static inline int rotbuffer_pos_diff(struct rotbuffer *r, char *p1, char *p2) {
00139         int l;
00140         l = p2 - p1;
00141         if (l<0)
00142                 l+=r->buff_size;
00143         return l;
00144 }
00145 #endif
